text: I find it easy to understand social cues and body language.
I prefer routines and get anxious when plans change unexpectedly.
I have intense interests in specific topics that I can talk about for hours.
I find it difficult to maintain eye contact during conversations.
I notice small details that others often miss.
I struggle to understand sarcasm or jokes that rely on context.
I feel overwhelmed in noisy or crowded environments.
I prefer to communicate directly and literally rather than using metaphors.
I have difficulty understanding other people's emotions or perspectives.
I engage in repetitive behaviors or movements when stressed or excited.
I find it easy to make small talk and chat casually with others.
I have a strong need for sameness and consistency in my daily life.
I can focus intensely on tasks that interest me for extended periods.
I struggle to understand unspoken social rules or expectations.
I am sensitive to certain textures, sounds, lights, or smells.
I find it challenging to start or maintain conversations.
I prefer to work alone rather than in groups.
I take things very literally and have difficulty understanding implied meanings.
I have difficulty recognizing when someone is bored or wants to change the topic.
I feel more comfortable with structured activities than spontaneous ones.
